comments:
Build ID: TPTP-4.4.0-200704020100

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Create a new default Capability i,e new_file.mcap
2.Go to the Properties tab of new_file.mcap
3.Add new property i,e property1 and save the editor
4.Again Try to add same property1 name, Event loop exception shows up in the error log view.
